cn.title: 暂停 Algo 收发的公告

message.data: 为配合 Algorand 2.0主网升级，Bitpie 钱包已于11月27日11：00 am（UTC+8）暂停 Algo 收发币功能，具体恢复时间另行通知，请您耐心等待。

新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“bitpieteam”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

en.title: ANN of Algo Sending / Receiving Suspension

message.data: In order to support the upgrade of the Algorand 2.0 mainnet, Bitpie wallet has suspended Algo's currency Sending / Receiving function at 11:00 am (UTC + 8) , Nov 27. The specific recovery time will be notified later, please be patient and wait.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us:
